post.heading: Long Hard Think About Tactics
post.p: I'm a sucker for gamification. Prospects of badges and points is a huge motivator for me. People can now see that I have the "Running Like a Lunatic"-badge on a social fitness platform, and that I have more points than them because of it. Feels great. Definitely worth it.
I always wish work was as rewarding. Work that feels rewarding gets done so easily and even feels better afterwards.
